Title: Anastasia
Genre: Animation, Adventure, Drama, Family, Fantasy, Musical, Mystery, Romance
Writer: Susan Gauthier (screenplay), Bruce Graham (screenplay), Bob Tzudiker (screenplay), Noni White (screenplay), Eric Tuchman (animation adaptation)
Actors: Meg Ryan, John Cusack, Kelsey Grammer, Christopher Lloyd
Plot: The daughter of the last Russian Tsar, Nicolas II, Anastasia is found by two Russian con men, Dimitri and Vladimir, who seek the reward that her grandmother, the Dowager Empress Marie, promised to the ones who'll find her. But the evil mystic of the Tsar family, Rasputin, still wants the Romanov family to be destroyed forever.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 10 wins & 21 nominations.
